Pipeman Updater

Pipeman Docs¶

update.OSCheck()¶

Pipeman is developed on Windows, with no cross-platform testing. An OS check is performed to confirm Windows compatibility as well as future OS support.

Returns

Returns True/False if a compatible OS is detected

Return type

bool, False

update.download()¶

Downloads the latest code from repository.

Returns

Returns zip file path

Return type

str

update.unpack(src, dst)¶

Unpacks zip file to destination.

Parameters

  • src (str) – Path to zip file

  • dst (str) – Path to write zip file contents to

Returns

Root directory of unpacked files

Return type

str
